long_description: This girls' REI Balaclava furnishes young faces with warmth. It's ideal for snow play in extreme cold that calls for more coverage than a beanie. Midweight polyester fabric on the top is warm, breathable and moisture-wicking and fits nicely under a helmet; microfleece on the bottom is soft and warm against the skin. Face opening can be pulled down to the chin, letting a girl eat her baklava without removing her balaclava.
